name: PersonalizationDictionary.RequiredPersonalizationInfo
desc: An object that contains the user-entered information for a personalized pass.

items.name: emailAddress
items.desc: The user-entered email address for the user of the personalized pass.

items.name: familyName
items.desc: The family name for the user of the personalized pass, parsed from the full name. The name can indicate membership in a group.

items.name: fullName
items.desc: The user-entered full name for the user of the personalized pass.

items.name: givenName
items.desc: The given name for the user of the personalized pass, parsed from the full name. The system uses the name to differentiate the individual from other members who share the same family name. In some locales, the given name is also known as a forename or first name.

items.name: ISOCountryCode
items.desc: The ISO country code. The system sets this key when it’s known; otherwise, it doesn’t include the key.

items.name: phoneNumber
items.desc: The user-entered phone number for the user of the personalized pass.

items.name: postalCode
items.desc: The user-entered postal code for the user of the personalized pass.
